info.description:
=========
 PPA-Spy
=========

What is PPA-Spy?
================

`PPA-Spy <http://www.florian-diesch.de/software/ppa-spy/>`_ provides
simple GUI that shows you some information about a PPA (Personal
Package Archive) that is hosted on launchpad.net

PPA-Spy uses the official launchpad.net API

Status
======

PPA-Spy is alpha software. So far it seems to work for me but it may
have severe bugs I didn’t noticed yet. Use it at your own risk.

If you find a bug in PPA-Spy please report it at the bugtracker at
Launchpad so that I can fix it. Thank you.

Requirements
============

PPA-Spy needs:

* Python3 (Ubuntu: package python3-minimal)
* Python3 support for GObject Introspection (Ubuntu: package python3-gi
* Python3 support for Launchpad clients (Ubuntu: package
  python3-launchpadlib)
* setup-tools for Python3 (Ubuntu: package python3-setuptools)

When you install the .deb package file all necessary packages will
automatically installed.

.. note Because of python3-launchpadlib PPY-Spy needs at least Ubuntu
   15.04 “Vivid Vervet”
   
Bugreports, suggestions, ideas, ...
===================================

For bug reports or feature requests please use the bugtracker at Launchapd

You may use German or English language.

Translations
============

If you want to help to translate PPA-Spy to other languages go to the
translation page at Launchpad.

You can open this web page from the Help menu in PPA-Spy, too.

To see the list of people who contributed to the translations you are
using go to Help –> About –> Credits in PPA-Spy.

Thanks to all contributors!

Questions and answers
=====================

If you have questions about PPA-Spy go to the “Answers” page at
Launchpad. If you want you can help to answer questions there, too.

You can open this web page from the Help menu in PPA-Spy, too.

You may use German or English language.

Source code
===========

The source code is available from the Bazaar repository at Lauchpad

You can open this web page from the Help menu in PPA-Spy, too.

License
=======
